nodes.text: This green-bladed lightsaber belonged to the Thisspiasian Jedi Master Oppo Rancisis. Though Rancisis was adept with his lightsaber, he preferred to use his highly developed Force powers in combat.

Oppo Rancisis' lightsaber was set to make an appearance in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series before its cancellation. Designs for the lightsaber were based on Count Dooku's lightsaber and were revealed by showrunner Dave Filoni and Lucasfilm Story Group's Pablo Hidalgo during their The Untold Clone Wars panel at Celebration Anaheim in 2015.
